metadata.name: Level 6
metadata.description:
Xpass will be used to access the feed in the Xtok application. This collection is the first and has unique benefits for holders. All Xpass from Genesis Collection will grant FOREVER access to the Xtok video feed.

About Xtok We build the next step to the future of adult entertainment after content-subscription services like Onlyfans or Patreon. Xtok strives to solve the traffic problem for creators and replace managers who take up to 70 percent of the creator's income.

We turn subscribers into producers and give users a unique opportunity to earn on growing creator popularity and become a part of this business.

Xtok company strives to build a product in the adult industry that will protect and respect the rights of creators, create new opportunities for stable and secure earnings, and eventually put the reputation of the profession and the rights of adult creators on an equal footing with the rest.
